section.heading: Revocation of license for failure to file statement.
section.text: If any such company shall fail to file the annual statement herein required, the Commissioner of Insurance and Securities [Commissioner of the Department of Insurance, Securities, and Banking] may thereupon revoke its license or certificate of authority to transact business in the District of Columbia.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: renumbered as § 7, Sept. 26, 1984, D.C. Law 5-113, § 401, 31 DCR 3974

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.text: Mayor authorized to issue rules: See notes to § 47-2601.
Department of Insurance abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2603.
